attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The village of Strumpshaw's population is growing rapidly; there are 2 pubs a Post Office and a house, but no University!

I am asking you, the government to build a University in Strumpshaw so that it's occupants and people from neighbouring villages can go to University there.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
